name: Merging Cube
description:
Jump with "SPACE" and slam the ground with "S" to kill the enemies (or hold both keys). Press F to merge with enemies and get their powers. You can only damage enemies that are the same color as you. Merge with enemies of different colors to deal damage to more enemy types.

Merge with 3 different colors to become white(all color types) and deal extra damage.

Enemy types:

- Default Cube. Deals some damage, does nothing

- Vampire Cube. Heals its HP based on its damage. (You get lifesteal if you merge with it)

-Spiky Cube. Returns some damage you deal back to you (You reflect some damage back to enemies if you merge with it)

- Healthy Cube. Has lots of HP. (You increase your max HP if you merge with it)

- Time Cube. Doesn't wanna fight. Your timer goes faster when you're near him (You get the White Form, lots of EXP, and the timer goes slower if you merge with it)

-Slam Cube. Deals a lot of damage, has a lot of HP. (You get White Form if you TRY to merge with it. After killing it your Ground Slam damage increases)
